subject: Re: GPUs Final Presentation
body_text:
Hi Ankita,

I received your first email. It will be taken into account when the
schedule is set.

Z

>
> Hi Professor Zahran,
>

> my original email below.
>
> Thank you,
> Ankita

>
> Hi Professor Zahran,

> GPU project's presentation. I have a final presentation for another class
> on December 10th at 8:30 pm.
>
> Would it be possible to schedule me for the presentation on December 3rd
> or in an early slot on December 10th? My group number is *31*

body_html:
Hi Ankita,

I received your first email. It will be taken into account when the schedule is set.

Z


On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 5:04 PM Ankita Tripathi <at6651@nyu.edu> wrote:

Hi Professor Zahran,

I previously reached out to you about the final presentation scheduling but it looks like I sent the email to the wrong email address. Please find my original email below.

Thank you,
Ankita


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ankita Tripathi <at6651@nyu.edu>
Date: Wed, Nov 19, 2025 at 11:54 PM
Subject: GPUs Final Presentation
To: Mohamed Zahran <mohamed.zahran@nyu.edu>


Hi Professor Zahran,

I hope you're well. I wanted to discuss a potential time conflict for the GPU project's presentation. I have a final presentation for another class on December 10th at 8:30 pm. 

Would it be possible to schedule me for the presentation on December 3rd or in an early slot on December 10th? My group number is 31 (GPU-Accelerated Monte Carlo Option Pricing: Barrier Options).

Please let me know.

Thank you,
Ankita 


--
-------------------------------------------------------------
Prof. Mohamed Zahran
Computer Science Department
Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences
NYU
http://www.mzahran.com
-------------------------------------------------------------
